Systems:

BARRICADE

GRAVITON LANCE

At T2–3, this weapon can make two attacks at once, hitting one character twice or two characters once.

MOBILE PRINTER

The Barricade prints a Size 2 cube in a free and adjacent area. The cube provides hard cover and is a single object with 20 HP and Evasion 5.

SHOCK PLATING

The Barricade has Resistance to kinetic damage.

BULWARK MODS

The Barricade ignores difficult terrain and dangerous terrain.

DRAG DOWN

The Barricade makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a success, they take 2 AP Energy damage per space that they voluntarily move until the end of their next turn.

SEISMIC REPULSOR

All non-flying characters within a Burst 3 area must pass a Hull save or be knocked 3 spaces back from the Barricade and knocked Prone. The affected area becomes difficult terrain for the rest of the scene.

COMMANDER

VOICE OF AUTHORITY

Trigger:An allied character fails an attack, check or save, and the Commander isn’t Jammed.
The ally can reroll it.

REINFORCED

The Commander gains +1 Structure and +1 Stress.

COMMANDER TRAITS

The Commander chooses one option from the Commander Traits list. It doesn’t function if the Commander is Jammed.

QUICK MARCH

One allied character within line of sight of the Commander may Boost.

PRESS ON!

The Commander clears either the Stunned condition or the Jammed condition currently affecting an allied character within line of sight.
